content:
There are ten types of clouds, classified into two categories: high clouds, middle clouds, and low clouds.

High Clouds:
1. Cirrus
2. Cirrostratus
3. Cirrocumulus

Middle Clouds:
4. Altostratus
5. Altocumulus

Low Clouds:
6. Stratus
7. Stratocumulus
8. Nimbostratus

Clouds with Extensive Vertical Development:
9. Cumulus
10. Cumulonimbus
